name: Mahnietyk
description:
Change charge of your bubble to escape gulls and stormy weather!

J - gain negative charge

K - gain positive charge

This is my first game ever created, don't expect much :) The game uses goaseprite to load animations, if you encounter issues, you might want to use `go get github.com/theonlymoby/mahnietyk` to download assets and run it from there.
